import React from 'react' import { Button, Header, Icon, Modal } from 'semantic-ui-react' function ModalImage() { const [open, setOpen] = React.useState(false) return ( setOpen(false)} onOpen={() => setOpen(true)} open={open} size='small' trigger={} >
Archive Old Messages

Your inbox is getting full, would you like us to enable automatic archiving of old messages?

) } export default ModalImage
